channel.title: Been trying to host a cod4 server
channel.description:
kso, as you may have read I've been developing a call of duty 4 server.
shit's fucking retarded though. Let me explain my problem:
People try to connect, doesn't work. Yes, ports are forwarded, no firewall.
here's the weirder thing, I can connect through 127.0.0.1, though not my IP address, and when I try to check if the port is open on some website like Is this port open, it says it's open. And I get a connection attempt from their website.
so wat ?????????

item.title: Been trying to host a cod4 server
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

jmood128:

Do you have the no-ip software? or anything else like it?

No. They connect through my ip address, xx.xxx.xxx.xxx:28960

Read full topic
item.source: Been trying to host a cod4 server
